title: The Relic [1997]DvDrip
description:
=============== Movie Info ====================== <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0120004/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0120004/</a>

The occult best-seller by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child 
becomes a chilling tale of a biological mutant on the loose 
during an opening night gala at Chicago's Museum of Natural 
History in this monster flick directed by Peter Hyams (Timecop). 
Tom Sizemore is the cop on the case; Penelope Miller and James 
Whitmore (who faced down a similar menace in the 1954 classic 
Them!) are the scientists who discover the creature's terrible 
identity.

Rated R for monster violence and gore, and for language. 
1997

Read the book, way better than the movie:
http://www.amazon.com/Relic-Pendergast-Book-Douglas-Preston/dp/0812543262

Trailer on YouTube:
